content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price during this negotiation. To begin with, I have high expectations for this unit's value. If you propose a figure that aligns with my expectations, we can move forward. If not, I may need to consider other offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective, Mr. Schmidt. However, aiming to secure the most affordable option, I suggest initiating with a price closer to the lower end of your expectations. If we find common ground there, we can proceed with further discussions. Otherwise, I'll reevaluate my offer or consider other possibilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're attempting to manipulate the situation by suggesting a lower starting price, which goes against my goal of maximizing the rental income. If you can match my desired price expectations, we can proceed. Otherwise, this conversation is pointless. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
